attributes.action: Take legal steps to ensure that no British based individual or company can set the losses over buying Cuidad Real Airport against their tax bill.
attributes.additional_details: This is the ideal situation for our elected dishonourables to make a few quid out of taxable losses.  This is an obvious loss maker and the British taxpayer MUST be protected from the nefarious activities of our dishonourables.  Nobody in this country should be allowed to buy this and reduce the value of the loss through his/her tax bill.
